package.name: sdpo_hangfaq2_nav_conf
package.description: Launch files required for the 5DPO Navigation Stack on the Hangfa Discovery Q2 (http://www.hangfa.com/EN/robot/DiscoveryQ2.html). The system implemented is based on the INESC TEC Robotics Navigation Stack that it allows you to have different configurations implemented and selecting just one based on your environment variables.
